description: The man shown being arrested in this film at a 1963 protest over segregation is Bernie Sanders, then a 21-year-old student at the University of Chicago, his campaign says.
title: Bernie Sanders's 1963 Protest Arrest
title_page: Bernie Sanders's 1963 Protest Arrest - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The man shown being arrested in this film at a 1963 protest over segregation is Bernie Sanders, then a 21-year-old student at the University of Chicago, his campaign says.
